text:
The 2017 Teen Choice Awards are set to air in just a few hours and there are so many celebs set to take the stage this evening!

There will be dozens of awards given out, including three very special honors.

Miley Cyrus will accept the Ultimate Choice Award, Maroon 5 will receive the highly coveted Decade Award and Bruno Mars will be honored with the Visionary Award.

In addition, there’s going to be a slew of amazing performances to keep you dancing in your seat!

Click inside to see the full list of performers, presenters, and attendees…

PERFORMERS

Louis Tomlinson and Bebe Rexha

Clean Bandit with Zara Larsson

Kyle, Lil Yachty and Rita Ora

The cast of FOX’s Star

hip-hop duo Rae Sremmurd

French Montana, featuring Swae Lee with Uganda‘s Triplets Ghetto Kids

PRESENTERS/ATTENDEES

Anthony Anderson

Fifth Harmony

Logan Paul

Adam Scott and Craig Robinson

Kaitlin Olson and Thomas Barbusca

Ed Sheeran

Shawn Mendes

Zendaya

Chris Pratt

Lucy Hale

Janel Parrish

Victoria Justice

Tyler Posey

Camila Cabello

Millie Bobby Brown

Gal Gadot

Tyler Hoechlin

Grant Gustin

Melissa Benoist

Olivia Munn

Bella Thorne

Kumail Nanjiani

Katherine Langford

Maddie Ziegler

Grace Vanderwaal

The Dolan Twins

Hudson Yang

Riverdale cast

Liza Koshy

Marshmello
